game.name: Jungles Adventures
game.description:
The highly addictive and engaging arcade challenge is out! Would you like to give it a try and go on a unique adventure today? Join Jungles Adventures and be prepared to play the coolest online game that is designed on simple gameplay and features easy-to-understand controls! Your objective in this amazing online game is to destroy as many points as possible to get your name placed on the top of the leaderboard. This classic match puzzle includes a jungle style theme and playful sounds.

There is no need to put an unwanted strain on your brain to set your best score. Make sure to move squares timely and wisely so that three or more squares of the same color can be removed and you get some points. You can drag and tap squares with the help of a mouse. Be careful and try to be a little fast as your game will be over the square of any colour will touch the top area of the screen!

The right portion of the screen will show your present score. Try to work hard on your quick reflexes and hand-eye coordination abilities to beat your previous score and create your new best score! In case if you find it a less engaging and interesting, feel free to check out our wider category of free arcade games that you can browse through multiple devices without download. Our match 3 puzzles are designed for everyone so try them out to kill your boredom no matter how old you are.

game.webControlKeys: LEFT CLICK TO EXCHANGE NEAR BY BRICK
